plot: When Larry Ravioli sets out to become a lounge singer, his loan from the Mafia gets called in. He must do as they say or else. Ravioli sings his way through murder and mayhem while bumbling each assignment.
title: Larry Ravioli
plot_es: When Larry Ravioli sets out to become a lounge singer, his loan from the Mafia gets called in. He must do as they say or else. Ravioli sings his way through murder and mayhem while bumbling each assignment.
plot_en: When Larry Ravioli sets out to become a lounge singer, his loan from the Mafia gets called in. He must do as they say or else. Ravioli sings his way through murder and mayhem while bumbling each assignment.
